title: Italy Fines Apple €98.6 Million Over ATT Rules Limiting App Store Competition
description: Apple has been fined €98.6 million ($116 million) by Italy's antitrust authority after finding that the company's App Tracking Transparency (ATT) privacy framework restricted App Store competition.
